mapper.select: select r.ordr_cd, r.ordr_req_dt, v.vend_cd, v.vend_nm from rsc_ordr r join vend v on r.vend_cd = v.vend_cd

select dt.ordr_cd, dt.rsc_cd, dt.ordr_cnt, dt.paprd_cmnd_dt, ord.ordr_req_dt, ord.vend_cd, v.vend_nm, r.rsc_nm, rsc.rsc_stc, rsc.saf_stc from rsc_ordr_dtl dt join rsc_ordr ord on dt.ordr_cd=ord.ordr_cd join vend v on ord.vend_cd = v.vend_cd join rsc r on dt.rsc_cd = r.rsc_cd FULL join rsc_stc rsc on r.rsc_cd = rsc.rsc_cd where dt.ordr_cd = #{ordrCd}
